plot: Following the plight of terminal cancer patients as they seek the therapy of The Burzynski Clinic, after all mainstream cancer centers have left them for dead.
title: Burzynski: Cancer Is Serious Business, Part II
plot_es: Following the plight of terminal cancer patients as they seek the therapy of The Burzynski Clinic, after all mainstream cancer centers have left them for dead.
original_name: Burzynski: Cancer Is Serious Business, Part II
plot_en: Following the plight of terminal cancer patients as they seek the therapy of The Burzynski Clinic, after all mainstream cancer centers have left them for dead.
